Title: AN ACT FIXING THE SALARY OF THE SPEAKER OF THE NATIONAL ASSEMBLY AT TWELVE THOUSAND PESOS PER ANNUM.(awÞhi(
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 14, December 31, 1935 ]
AN ACT FIXING THE SALARY OF THE SPEAKER OF THE NATIONAL ASSEMBLY AT TWELVE THOUSAND PESOS PER ANNUM.(awÞhi(
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The Speaker of the National Assembly shall receive an annual salary of twelve thousand pesos.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, December 31, 1935.
